com.cloudera.oryx.computation.common

Class DistributedGenerationRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudera.oryx.computation.common.GenerationRunner
      • com.cloudera.oryx.computation.common.DistributedGenerationRunner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Callable<Object>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ALSDistributedGenerationRunner, KMeansDistributedGenerationRunner, RDFDistributedGenerationRunner

    public abstract class DistributedGenerationRunner
extends GenerationRunner
    A DistributedGenerationRunner completely manages execution of one generation's worth of computation on Hadoop. It is a template, overridden with details specific to particular types of jobs, like clustering.

      • getPreDependencies

        protected abstract List<DependsOn<Class<? extends JobStep>>> getPreDependencies()
        Returns:
        List of DependsOn dependencies expressing the JobSteps that need to happen in the initial phase, before iteration

      • getIterationDependencies

        protected abstract List<DependsOn<Class<? extends JobStep>>> getIterationDependencies()
        Returns:
        List of DependsOn dependencies expressing the JobSteps that need to happen during iteration

      • getPostDependencies

        protected abstract List<DependsOn<Class<? extends JobStep>>> getPostDependencies()
        Returns:
        List of DependsOn dependencies expressing the JobSteps that need to happen in the final phase, after iteration

      • buildConfig

        protected abstract JobStepConfig buildConfig(int iteration)
        Parameters:
        iteration - iteration number, or 0 if there is no iteration context
        Returns:
        JobStepConfig appropriate to pass to JobStep
